name: phonebook-backend

scripts.build:ui: rm -rf dist && cd ../../part2/phonebook && npm run build && cp -r dist ../../part3/phonebook-backend
scripts.deploy:full: npm run build:ui && git add . && git commit -m 'uibuild' && git push

author: Eleonora Kopiika
description: Full Stack Open Part 3 backend for Phonebook app
